result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roger Duane Gallagher

records.addlTxt: Defendant here today at Collections window to apply for county appointed attorney - to return with completed Petition for Counsel, bring along SPD Financial Eligibility Worksheet and provide most recent paystub.

2:28 PM Defendant Roger Duane Gallagher in court.  Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant advised of right to attorney.  Defendant given information regarding SPD and court appointed attorney.  Case rescheduled.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 02:20 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing. 
Trial Judge - Br 13

02:21 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Luis C Cuevas.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 02:20 pm.
